title: Every mail I send fails
creator: Daniel5
content:
Hey. Every single time I send an email, it fails with the following message: "ErrnoException: isConnected failed: ECO- NNABORTED (Software caused connection abort)" The strange thing is that is always sends the email straight away when I manually navigate to "Outbox" and asks Thunderbird to try sending it again.

Device info: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, Android 15, One UI 7. It has always been like this, even before the new One UI update.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/136.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android 15, One UI 7

title: Spam messages
creator: john347
content: In my computer I can mark message as spam. Can l do this in Android version?
